item.title: Vipul is
item.description:
• He/His/Him
  • Infrastructure team member at Fedora and CentOS - Community Platform Engineering @ Red Hat
  • Mindshare committe member- Mentored Project Lead @ Fedora Project
  • Fedora Council member- D&I advisor
  • Distribution Devroom manager @ FOSDEM
  • very serious about anime and manga
